New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 131 in 84 balls, breaking Kapil Dev's 40-year-old record for the fastest century in an ODI.
Rohit Sharma became the fastest player to reach 1000 World Cup runs in 19 innings, tying with David Warner.
Rohit Sharma overtook Ricky Ponting to third in the ODI century list with his 31st century.
Rohit Sharma surpassed Chris Gayle for the most sixes in international cricket, reaching 556 sixes.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's 16 fours and five sixes dominated the match.
Afghanistan's bowlers, led by Rashid Khan, struggled to contain India.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma was awarded Player of the Match for his exceptional performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
The venue was the Arun Jaitley Stadium.
